featured.text: They found that the sick plants could “sneeze” and 23 tiny water drops filled with leaf rust germs, spreading the disease to neighboring plants.
Scientists already knew earlier that wind and splashes of rainwater can move bacteria and other germs from leaf to leaf.

definition.zh_def: 微生物，特別是能引起疾病的細菌或病毒。
definition.en_def: A microorganism, especially one that causes disease.
definition.example: Washing your hands helps to eliminate germs.
